summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a plan to have Staley's daughter on a speaker phone call. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended only for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a personal call involving Jes Staley's daughter.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which discusses a plan to include his daughter in a phone call.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley appear to have a personal relationship, as evidenced by the informal nature of the email discussing family matters.

keyFacts: The email was sent on November 18, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein is planning a phone call involving Jes Staley's daughter.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
